item.description: Podcast Description Can’t sit crossed legged, big tings and juicy egusi. Lean in, it’s Jimmy Akingbola. item.title: Here Lies Alastair Campbell | Where There's A Will, There's A Wake
item.description: Podcast Description Persivilience, a squeezed & blown bagpipe, and Piers Morgan Might as well f**k off, Alastair Campbel Oi! We’ve only gone and reached our 50th episode milestone. Thanks for tuning in every week… And speaking of tunes, we have something EXTRA special for you deathly lot at the end of the episode. Want the episodes ad free AND extra content from Kathy? 6 Feet Under steps away from fantasy and rifles through your real funeral tales.

item.title: Here Lies Dawn French | Where There's A Will, There's A Wake
item.description: Podcast Description A death that involves an incident with a massive t**t, where Dawn’s body will be laid(ish) to rest and the unforgivable mistake that you could make at her wake which just might result in your own untimely passing. It’s the one and only Dawn French’s fantasy funeral. R.I.P Dawn. But before that, you can get tickets to see Dawn live in Jack and the Beanstalk at the London Palladium here: lwtheatres.

item.title: Here Lies Bob Mortimer | Where There's A Will, There's A Wake
Here Lies Joe Lycett | Where There's A Will, There's A Wake
item.description: Podcast Description It’s a shot to the back of the head in a hammock, a reincarnation as a diddling monkey and an unexpected musical accompaniment to the cremation – it could only be one thing, Joe Lycett’s fantasy funeral. It wasn’t easy to let you go, Joe. Also check out ‘Joe Lycett – More, More, More! How Do You Lycett? How Do You Lycett?’ which is streaming now at watch.joelycett.com. Joe Lycett vs David Beckham: A Got Your Back Christmas Special airs at 9pm on Channel 4 on 15th Dec.

item.title: Introducing... Show on the Road | Where There's A Will, There's A Wake
item.description: Podcast Description Show on the Road by Auto Trader takes the traditional celebrity podcast out of the studio and into a car for a road trip like no other. Join us as we buckle up with celeb guests and follow a route unique to their story. Placed in one of the most intimate settings, the passenger seat, our guests reveal the places and experiences that have brought them to where they are today.

item.description: Podcast Description Chips and gravy, a Lily Savage lookalike, and a wave machine. Where’s the loo, Jonathan Harvey? This week’s deathly episode is EXTRA devilish, as we join Kathy and her best mate, the Gimme Gimme Gimme creator, Jonathan Harvey for their joint birthday episode! Want the episodes ad free AND extra content from Kathy? 6 Feet Under steps away from fantasy and rifles through your real funeral tales. Head to wheretheresawilltheresawake.

item.title: Back From The Dead | Where There's A Will, There's A Wake
item.description: Podcast Description F**kin’ hell, Kathy’s back. Join us next week as we laugh ourselves to death… Yet again. And what a sensational line up we have in store, with the likes of Alan Carr, Emily Atack, Jack Whitehall and Bob Mortimer all visiting the dark depths of the podcasting sphere to plan how they want to bite the dust. A Sony Music Entertainment production. Find more great podcasts from Sony Music Entertainment at sonymusic.

item.title: Here Lies Fern Brady | Where There's A Will, There's A Wake
item.description: Podcast Description Gunning down Catford’s cat callers, an interrupted threesome with two Irish men, and a priest ban at her funeral. Oh nooooo… It’s Fern Brady. item.description: Podcast Description There’s the showbiz funeral, and then there’s the real one. It was a quiet and peaceful death, surrounded by family. With the gentle theme of White Horses blowing through the window. The honour is all ours, Jennifer Saunders. Want the episodes ad free AND extra content from Kathy? 6 Feet Under steps away from fantasy and rifles through your real funeral tales. Head to wheretheresawilltheresawake.com to subscribe. item.title: Here Lies Tim Key | Where There's A Will, There's A Wake
item.description: Podcast Description A true hero’s death - taking a bullet for a friend. The funeral’s somber but the drinks are flowing, and boy are we going down some rabbit holes to get there. Welcome to the Dead Poets Society, Tim Key. Tim is currently on tour with Tim Key: Mulberry - get tickets here: https://www.timkey.co.uk/shows-1 Want the episodes ad free AND extra content from Kathy? 6 Feet Under steps away from fantasy and rifles through your real funeral tales.

item.title: Here Lies Kerry Godliman | Where There's A Will, There's A Wake
item.description: Podcast Description Fail to prepare then prepare to fail - that’s the mantra and there’s no way we’re not planning the shit out of this death - lists galore and a Tetris approach to fitting everyone in the graveyard. You ready, Kerry Godliman? Want the episodes ad free AND extra content from Kathy? 6 Feet Under steps away from fantasy and rifles through your real funeral tales. Head to wheretheresawilltheresawake.com to subscribe.

item.description: Podcast Description She might be dead, but boy does she look good. There’s a front cover of a Vogue magazine (naturally) and one hell of a spread for the buffet. Ghosted no more Joanne… …but haunted by Vogue Williams. Want the episodes ad free AND extra content from Kathy? 6 Feet Under steps away from fantasy and rifles through your real funeral tales. item.title: Here Lies Andi Oliver | Where There's A Will, There's A Wake
item.description: Podcast Description She lived a happy life, she ’tried not to be a c***’, and she met her end with a Midsomer Murders-style freak accident. And, of course, the news was announced on the cover of Bunty. Dinner is served, Andi Oliver. Want the episodes ad free AND extra content from Kathy? Six Feet Under steps away from fantasy and rifles through your real funeral tales. Head to wheretheresawilltheresawake.com to subscribe.

item.title: 6 Feet Under: What you’re missing | Where There's A Will, There's A Wake
item.description: Podcast Description ‘Tis the season for giving, so here’s a little glimpse at all the ghoulishly good content you can get over at 6 Feet Under. When our celebrity guest has popped it and had the funeral of their fantasy, Kathy and her Goddesses take a seat in the post room of the after world to rifle through your real-life death anecdotes and funeral stories. Plus Kathy talks to natural under taker Ru Calendar who shares why he got into the business, his funeral planning wisdom and the future of aquamation.

item.title: Here Lies Jamali Maddix | Where There's A Will, There's A Wake
item.description: Podcast Description Half buried, half cremated, small, but rammed, details matter when it comes to the funeral of Jamali Maddix. Missed like a set of keys. Want the episodes ad free AND extra content from Kathy? 6 Feet Under steps away from fantasy and rifles through your real funeral tales. Head to wheretheresawilltheresawake.com to subscribe. A Somethin’ Else and Sony Music Entertainment production Find more great podcasts from Sony Music Entertainment at sonymusic.

item.title: Introducing: 6 Feet Under | Where There's A Will, There's A Wake
item.description: Podcast Description But wait, there’s more! Introducing Where There’s A Will There’s A Wake: 6 Feet Under. After every episode Kathy and her producer goddess will pull out some of their favourite funeral based correspondence from YOU. Not only that, but once a month Kathy will be chatting to ethical undertaker and author Ru Callender about all things death, expect to hear a fresh perspective on death and funerals that you may not have heard before.

item.title: Here Lies Stewart Lee | Where There's A Will, There's A Wake
item.description: Podcast Description An onstage death, then a simple viking burial ship to Scotland and eaten by otters - nothing fancy. Must be Stewart Lee’s funeral. What’s that smell? That’ll be Stewart’s ghost. Want to listen to the show ad-free AND get access to extra episodes every week? Subscribe to 6 Feet Under to get access to special bonus episodes where you can join Kathy as she steps away from fantasy and rifles through your real funeral tales.

item.title: Here Lies Roisin Conaty | Where There's A Will, There's A Wake
item.description: Podcast Description An end of world celebrity experience in this relaxing death topped off by Roisin’s lottery will… roll up, roll up! So long shameless, Roisin. Want the episodes ad free AND extra content from Kathy? 6 Feet Under steps away from fantasy and rifles through your real funeral tales. Head to wheretheresawilltheresawake.com to subscribe. A Somethin’ Else and Sony Music Entertainment production Find more great podcasts from Sony Music Entertainment at sonymusic.

item.title: Here Lies Diane Morgan | Where There's A Will, There's A Wake
Introducing... Where There's A Will, There's A Wake | Where There's A Will, There's A Wake
item.description: Podcast Description If you could plan your perfect death, what would you do? If you were getting married you’d consult a wedding planner, who takes you through everything from what music you’re walking into, what flowers to buy and who you’re going to invite. Now change the word “wedding” to “funeral”… Kathy Burke is the host of the brand new podcast, ‘Where There’s a Will, There’s a Wake’, where she chats to her famous friends about their fantasy funeral.
